reapack.name: 8 Channel Mixer.jsfx
reapack.desc: : Utility for mixing 4 stereo pairs on a single track

reapack.name: Create folder from selected tracks.lua
reapack.desc: Group selected tracks into a new folder track with a selected color

reapack.name: Insert New Track to Receive From Selected Track_Audio.lua
reapack.desc: Creates a new track after the selected track which receives the selected track's audio

reapack.name: Insert New Track to Receive From Selected Track_MIDI.lua
reapack.desc: Creates a new track after the selected track which receives the selected track's midi

reapack.name: Insert New Track to Receive From Selected Track_midi and Audio.lua
reapack.desc: Creates a new track after the selected track which receives the selected track's signal
